title: What is this font?
content:
Hello,

What is this font?

The closest I can find is Harrington. But we are reprinting this book and I need to know what font this is to recreate the cover.

We couldn't find it for building the website so we used Harrington: [http://www.haikuwisdom.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713230932/http:/www.haikuwisdom.com/ "http://www.haikuwisdom.com/")

But now we need the font for the second edition of the book. The original publisher is unavailable.

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you,  
Diana aka Bonesai

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713230932im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_4912.PNG)
author: Bonesai

comments.content:
I am so sorry. I reposted this to FONT ID. But I am unable to delete this post.

Thank you  
Diana
